trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> includes several scripts that run the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools and utilities. How you run those scripts depends on the configuration that you want to use to access the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database and tools.
